Package fr.istic.aco.editor.kernel

Class Recorder

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.kernel.Recorder
public class Recorder extends Object
The Recorder class is responsible for recording and replaying commands in the text editor. It uses the Memento design pattern to save and restore the state of commands.

  • Method Details

    • isReplaying

      public boolean isReplaying()
      Checks if the recorder is currently replaying actions.
      Returns:
      true if replaying, false otherwise

    • save

      public void save(CommandOriginator originator)
      Saves the current state of a command originator if isRecording flag is enabled.
      Parameters:
      originator - the command originator to save

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts recording actions.
